text: Joanna Caroline Newsom (born January 18, 1982) is an indie singer and a harpist. She was born in Nevada City. ==Early life== Newsom was not allowed to watch television or listen to the radio when she was a child. She went to a Waldorf school. After high school Newsom studied composition and creative writing at Mills College in Oakland, California. ==Career== Newsom's first album The Milk-Eyed Mender was released by Drag City on the 23rd of February 2003. Pitchfork gave the album a score of 8 out of 10. Newsom's second album Ys was given a score of 9.4 out of 10. ==Personal life== She married comedian Andy Samberg in September 2013. ==Recordings== ;Albums *The Milk-Eyed Mender (Drag City, 2004) *Ys (Drag City, 2006) US #134, UK #41 *Have One on Me (Drag City, 2010) US #75, UK #28 *Divers (Drag City, 2015) ;Early unofficial recordings *Walnut Whales (self-released, 2002) *Yarn and Glue (self-released, 2003) ;EPs *Joanna Newsom and the Ys Street Band (Drag City, 2007) UK #135 ;Singles *"Sprout and the Bean" (Drag City, 2004) *"What We Have Known" (Drag City, 2011) ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from California Category:Mills College alumni
title: Joanna Newsom
